text:
This accessory matches this outfit...
Maybe this one...

Yeah...!
I think that one suits you the best...!

Oh...
But... I might also like this one...!

Hehe... with Producer-san,
Tenka's top choice... the same...!

If it's both of your recommendations,
then it must be right! I'll go with this one â˜†

I think going with red for
a pop of color might be nice.

You still think so?
...Right! It could make a good accent!

Wow...!
Here comes the third option...

...So Producer-san
likes this kind of thing... I see...
